title: Practicing Social Justice Through Instructional Design: A Duo-Ethnography-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental educational design theories and foundational knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: Workplace problem-solving projects based on office/administrative experience as working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design projects analyzing social justice issues in educational settings using duoethnography methodology.
Learners can propose culturally contextualized instructional design solutions through peer dialogue.
Learners can suggest concrete action strategies for addressing educational inequality through project outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
